description: replica of the 12-story Des Moines Building-Loan and Savings Association upon a beveled plinth; copper color with dark pigment accenting windows and building elements; coin slot and keyed access door under foot
inscription:
Inscriptions

across front roof: [210 SIXTH AVENUE]; around edge of base: [DES MOINES / BUILDING - LOAN and SAVINGS / ASSOCIATION / THE OLDEST IN DES MOINES]; under base on door: [BANTHRICO INC / CHICAGO, ILL / U.S.A.]
object_name: "Des Moines Building-Loan and Savings" still bank
title: "Des Moines Building-Loan and Savings" still bank
